name: mahal
description: Simple, modern web application framework for UI development.

scripts.build:compiler:dev: npm run install:compiler && npm run webpack:dev
scripts.build:pack: npm run build && npm run webpack:test && npm pack
scripts.build:test: npm run install:compiler && npm run build:pack && npm run test
scripts.build:test:dev: npm run build:pack && cd tests && npm run install:dev
scripts.test:dev: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.test:prod: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.build:dev: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.build:all: npm run webpack:dev && npm run webpack:prod && npm run webpack:test
scripts.build:ci: npm run lint && npm run build:all && npm pack && npm run install:compiler@latest && npm run pack:test
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm run build:ci
scripts.un:module: cd tests && npm un mahal && npm un mahal-html-compiler
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run install:same:version && npm run deploy

author: Ujjwal Gupta <https://ujjwalguptaofficial.github.io/>
